ing: 1/2 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed
des: "This is the best and easiest fudge recipe.  No one will ever guess it has cheese in it!"
ins:
In a saucepan, combine the processed cheese, cocoa, chocolate chips and margarine. Set over medium-low heat; cook, stirring frequently, until melted and well blended.
Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla, confectioners' sugar and walnuts. Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Allow to cool and then cut into small squares.
